text:
Encountered what appears to be a version dependency between Log4j and JUnit. 
The documentation needs to be updated to indicate which specific version of 
JUnit must be used with Log4j.  I have discovered that combining Log4j v1.1.3 
and JUnit 3.7 results in the following exception being thrown at runtime:  
java.lang.LinkageError:  Class org/xml/sax/InputSource violates loader 
constraints.  After spinning my wheels thinking there was something wrong with 
the way I was using the XML configuration file, I finally figured out what that 
message REALLY meant, and restarted my application with the older JUnit 3.2 
version in the classpath.  When I did that, it worked.  The documentation needs 
to be updated to point out this dependency.  Though it mentions a JUnit 
dependency, it doesn't specify which release.
creator: rgrant@longaberger.com

text: This should be fixed in log4j 1.2.
creator: ceki@apache.org
